item.title: Random Dentist Experience
item.description: This time So I was about to visit a dentist today. It was my last visit in this “session”. And I needed to fix a wisdom tooth. And I randomly recollected that at some point in the past when a dentist was injecting anestesia it felt like they are injecting the needle right into the bone. And since this was my last visit I felt like experimentating and not injecting anything this time.
